creator: valentine@library.ucsb.edu
text:
Docs say an remote file should work (manager commands), but it does not appear 
to work.

works:: 
http://db02:8080/manager/install?
path=/mw_test&war=jar:file:/export/home/adlmw/mw_webclient-0.91-dev.war!/

fails:: http://db02:8080/manager/install?
path=/mw_webclient&war=jar:http://moonstone.sdc.ucsb.edu/mw_webclient-0.91-
dev.war!/

FAIL - Encountered exception java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Invalid URL 
for web application archive: http://moonstone.sdc.ucsb.edu/mw_webclient-0.91-
dev.war

URL is correct. Browser offers to download file.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: Remote deployment should use 'deploy' (read the docs).

creator: valentine@library.ucsb.edu
text:
Ok, Docs confusing:
Install says 
"The supported syntax for a URL referring to a WAR file is described on the 
Javadocs page for the java.net.JarURLConnection class" which I implied to mean 
http. 

Will put in:
* enhancement request with a proposed documentataion update,
* enhancement to replace the invalid url error with a local file or directory 
only message. 
* enhancement request to add deploy to app developers docs 'build.xml' script, 
with instructions on differences.
